= Introduction =

Preferences window: <br>
[http://sites.google.com/site/bubbletranslate/BubbleTranslate1.png]


= Details =

Language:
  * *Select your language*, the selected text will be automatically translated into your language.

Toolstrip:
  * *Toolstrip click*. Select the action to do when click the Toolstrip Icon.
  * *Hide Toolstrip*. Not yet implemented.

When *Toolstrip click Translate Text* is selected for access the Preferences window just Ctrl+Click the Toolstrip.

Shortcut:
  * Select the Shortcut keys for translate without Toolstrip click.

Theme:
  * Select Toolstrip and Font colors.

You can use the *Shortcut* way and the *Toolstrip click* Preferences selected simultaneously.
